summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 17 November to end of Wednesday 17 November GMT
description: A bright sunny day on Wednesday after a cloudy start.<br/><br/>With a 'clean' Atlantic airflow and a westerly breeze ensuring good dispersion, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
